svg.onload: top.window.console.log('test 2 passed: html object svg, svg onload markup, handler called'); if (this.nodeName == 'svg') { top.window.console.log('test 3 passed: html object svg, svg onload markup, this is correct in handler'); } try { mywindowFunc4(); } catch(e) { top.window.console.log('test 4 failure:' + (e.message || e)); }

circle.onclick: top.window.console.log('test 5 passed: html object svg, circle onclick markup, handler called'); if (this.nodeName == 'circle') { top.window.console.log('test 6 passed: html object svg, circle onclick markup, this is correct in handler'); } try { mywindowFunc7(); } catch(e) { top.window.console.log('test 7 failure:' + (e.message || e)); }
